queries.query: select inputTitularIsentoCols from InputTitularIsentoColsEntity inputTitularIsentoColsEntity join fetch inputTitularIsentoCols.inputTitularIsento inputTitularIsento join fetch inputTitularIsentoCols.arquivoInputColsDef arquivoInputColsDef where inputTitularIsento.id = :id order by arquivoInputColsDef.ordem

select inputTitularIsentoCols from InputTitularIsentoColsEntity inputTitularIsentoCols join fetch inputTitularIsentoCols.arquivoInputColsDef arquivoInputColsDef join fetch arquivoInputColsDef.arquivoInput arquivoInput where arquivoInput.id = :id order by arquivoInputColsDef.ordem
